riddles.question: What has keys but can't open locks?
What has a head, a tail, but no body?
I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have nobody, but I come alive with wind. What am I?
I can cry without eyes and fly without wings. What am I?
I'm tall when I'm new and short when I'm old. What am I?
What can fill a room but takes up no space?
What can you break without touching it?
It belongs to you, but your friends use it more. What is it?
I weigh almost nothing, but even the world's strongest man couldn't hold me for much longer than a minute or two. What am I?
I can be bitter or sweet, but I'm always a treat, and in a bar or a cake, I'm something to eat. What am I?
I am always in front and never behind. What am I?
If you have me, you will want to share me. If you share me, you will no longer have me. What am I?
If you feed it, it lives; If you water it, it dies
What begins and ends with an ‘e’ but only contains one letter?
